name: Comrade Keys
description:
A Marxist typing game where the keys rebel against the tyranny of your bourgeois fingers. A Submission for the GMTK Jam 2020, theme "Out of Control"

  • Type your manifesto before you run out of time to save the proletariat with your words!
  • When your keys rebel, use the mouse to drag them back into place.

Made by Peter Gyory and Julia Uhr
